org.descriptionOne: Paolo's Pizza is a new Pizza delivery service based in Marple, UK.
org.descriptionTwo: We offer delicious, hand stretched Pizza, made in the authentic Neapolitan style and delivered directly to your door.
org.descriptionThree: When you can't go to the Pizzeria, let the Pizzeria come to you!
